# dviz

[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)

The goal of dviz is to provide useful tools for making fancy plots

## Installation

You can install the development version of dviz like so:

``` r
remotes::install_github("arturhgq/dviz")
```
